mapper.select: SELECT A.HPCM_ID, A.HPCM_SE_CODE, B.CODE_NM HPCM_SE_CODE_NM, A.HPCM_DFN, HPCM_DC, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNHPCMINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID ='COM021' AND A.HPCM_SE_CODE = B.CODE WHERE HPCM_ID=#{hpcmId}

SELECT HPCM_ID, HPCM_SE_CODE, HPCM_SE_CODE_NM, HPCM_DFN HPCM_DF, HPCM_DC, TO_CHAR(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,HPCM.* FROM ( SELECT A.HPCM_ID, A.HPCM_SE_CODE, B.CODE_NM HPCM_SE_CODE_NM, A.HPCM_DFN, HPCM_DC, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNHPCMINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID ='COM021' AND A.HPCM_SE_CODE = B.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND CODE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND HPCM_DFN LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
ORDER BY HPCM_ID DESC ) HPCM ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= #{recordCountPerPage} and RNUM > #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNHPCMINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID ='COM021' AND A.HPCM_SE_CODE = B.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND CODE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND HPCM_DFN LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNHPCMINFO (HPCM_ID , HPCM_SE_CODE , HPCM_DFN , HPCM_DC , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES ( #{hpcmId} , #{hpcmSeCode} , #{hpcmDf} , #{hpcmDc} , SYSDATETIME , #{frstRegisterId} , SYSDATETIME , #{lastUpdusrId} )
